column2: "It was a gamble, but it turned out okay. Really, he was lucky we caught it in the early stages."
"Simple, we just destroyed the Darker formation using photons."
"<%me> here did most of the hard work, though."
"He may have sustained some small wounds, but dragons heal quickly. He should heal on his own, given time."
"It's still too early to relax. This is just the beginning."
"More and more of you are going to become like this if you don't do something."
"I just want to communicate with you. That's what we both need right now."
"〔My name is〕〔En of clan Hi〕〔Ask your names〕〔ARKS〕"
"My name is Aki. This is my assistant, Light."
